drwxr-xr-x root       root               60 ./etc/pipewire
-rw-r--r-- root       root              875 ./etc/pipewire/pipewire.conf
drwxr-xr-x root       root               80 ./usr
drwxr-xr-x root       root              100 ./usr/bin
-rwxr-xr-x root       root             9676 ./usr/bin/pipewire
-rwxr-xr-x root       root            30328 ./usr/bin/pipewire-cli
-rwxr-xr-x root       root            22048 ./usr/bin/pipewire-monitor
drwxr-xr-x root       root               60 ./usr/lib
drwxr-xr-x root       root               60 ./usr/lib/systemd
drwxr-xr-x root       root               80 ./usr/lib/systemd/user
-rw-r--r-- root       root              819 ./usr/lib/systemd/user/pipewire.service
-rw-r--r-- root       root              130 ./usr/lib/systemd/user/pipewire.socket
